title: Riot, I want to thank you for the new VIktor bio.
body:
Greetings everyone, Arcyvilk here.

I am a big Viktor fan for a few years already. I was amongst all the people concerned when Jayce got released with his first lore; I was amongst people worried that shallowing him will happen again with the new Zaun-Piltover lore change. 

Without further ado - new Viktor bio is up. And... _it's perfect._ I have nothing more to add.

This thread is meant to say thank you to the writers responsible for it. You've managed to grasp his character's very essence; all the traits which made Viktor -_ Viktor_, which made us love the character; and gave him long awaited justice.

replies.body:
"RIOTS GONNA MESS UP VIKTOR111"

"Thank you riot"

oh how i hate people sometimes, so darn impatient

If we weren't vocal at the time, we would be stuck to the release Jayce lore and it would suck. Also, given the choices of some words in the story, I am sure the new lore got at least _a bit_ influenced by our feedback.

I am an author of one of the big worry threads which flooded boards just after the new Jayce lore came out. Now, when I got Viktor's lore and I like it, I decided to thank Riot for their great work. It seems like a thing that a decent human being should do after being granded for what one asked with such passion. Do you have a problem with that?

It's not even a matter of being patient. Riot has a history of lousing up Viktor's character... especially when Jayce is concerned. 

When Jayce was released almost 5 years ago his story painted Viktor up as a hypocritical villain. It wasn't until players voiced their dissatisfaction did Riot edit the story. 

It's not wholly unbelievable that when Riot released another Jayce story that paints up Viktor up as a mustache twirling villain that fans think they're taking the character another direction. It's not like Riot is above retcon.

That being said, I haven't played League in going on a year but I'm glad to see Riot did a FANTASTIC job with my favorite champion.

> Cheers, glad you like it!

Now please fix Zac's. The dead parents thing diminishes him.
Viktor got great work done, Mundo got shafted. So net even in all.
Wut. Dat mundo bio and story made me so happy.  What's wrong with it?

He is no longer the Mundo he was. 100% new character. 

He used to be this great Doctor who went and kidnapped people on the streets of Zaun for his experiements, but he ran out of subjects so tested on himself, becoming the hulking purple brute. But he was the epitemy of a Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde fantasy in the game where Hyde was always in control.

Go read his JoJ and you will see how much more depth he had than the now "Semi-retarded 'thing' obsessed with pain"
TL;DR his new lore for me.

Potential Icathian stranded in what is for him the far future as a baby, obviously insane, gets taken in by a mental hospital that runs experiments on him. At some point he decides to "play doctor" and murders absolutely everyone in there. Now he wanders the streets, still playing doctor and curing people (mudering everyone he meets and calling it medicine).

For the icatian part, see this thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/zEHiQiLm-i-just-realized-just-what-dr-mundo-is
Twas truly a wonderful read.  I had no idea what they were going to do with the corpses mentioned in Jayce's bio but the way everything worked out was perfect.
